meanings.definition: A person who believes in or promotes conspiracy theories.
meanings.sent1: The conspiracist claimed aliens were controlling the government.
meanings.sent2: The conspiracist shared a video about a secret organization ruling the world.
meanings.sent3: The conspiracist joked about a hidden group of cats plotting world domination.
meanings.sent4: The conspiracist's mind was a maze of hidden plots and schemes.
meanings.sent5: The conspiracist's wild theories made for entertaining conversations.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to conspiracy theories.
meanings.sent1: The conspiracist website was full of outlandish stories.
meanings.sent2: She dismissed the conspiracist ideas as far-fetched.
meanings.sent3: The conspiracist movie had viewers questioning reality.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a conspiracist playground of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The conspiracist mindset colored everything with suspicion.
